model_selector.label: Select Model
model_selector.desc_cnn: Convolutional neural network that analyzes the image directly.
model_selector.desc_svm: SVM classifier based on extracted image features.
model_selector.desc_rf: Random Forest model trained on extracted features.

model_info.title: About the used models
model_info.tip: We recommend using the CNN model for the most reliable diagnosis.

cnn.title: CNN (Convolutional Neural Network)
cnn.desc: This is the most advanced model. It learns from thousands of exams and can detect complex patterns in the images. Best choice for accurate results.

svm.title: SVM (Support Vector Machine)
svm.desc: This model analyzes shapes and contrasts in images to separate healthy from sick. Simpler than CNN, but still works well in many cases.

rf.title: Random Forest
rf.desc: Works like a team of decision trees that vote together. It's simple and fast, ideal for quick results even if slightly less accurate.
